long_description: Great for boating and travel, this personal pack protects small valuables like wallets and passports from the elements. Watertight roll-down closure keeps out water and debris. Zippered external pocket is perfect for storing keys, money and other small valuables. Adjustable webbing waistbelt with side-release buckle fits waists up to 50 in., and it can be removed when not in use. Features two D-ring lash points for convenient attachment to boat or larger pack. Use with cameras or sensitive electronic equipment is not recommended; pack is not designed for submersion.
short_description: Great for boating and travel, this personal pack protects small valuables like wallets and passports from the elements.
